subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer ended a long drought with his first title of the year, winning the Estoril Open when second-seeded Nikolay Davydenko retired with a left leg injury while trailing, 7-6 (5), 1-2.
snippet: Roger Federer ended a long drought with his first title of the year, winning the Estoril Open when second-seeded Nikolay Davydenko retired with a left leg injury while trailing, 7-6 (5), 1-2.
